termName: Variable rate controller for seed drills
title: Variable rate controller for seed drills, sprayers and fertiliser spreaders
summary: Variable rate controller for seed drills, sprayers and fertiliser spreaders

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a variable rate controller for seed drills, sprayers and fertiliser spreaders
eligible.eligibleBullet02: electronically vary and control the application rate of chemical or seed
eligible.eligibleBullet03: be able to be retrofitted to an existing implement to control application rates
eligible.eligibleBullet04: change the rate of application automatically without operator input
eligible.eligibleBullet05: record and download application rates to a computer or tablet
eligible.eligibleBullet07: have either an in-cab display or ISOBUS connection
eligible.eligibleBullet08: include equipment to fit on to the applicator to provide section control
